sub_title: Global HR Executive | Business & Operating Model Transformation | IMD Business School Alumni
summary: Passionate and impact-driven Global HR Executive with 17 years of professional experience across Healthcare and Automotive Industries. Proven track record leading global organizational transformations driving exceptional growth, profitability, quality and customer & employee experience. Known for my ability to navigate complex business landscapes, acting as a Thought Partner to the C-suite. Deep expertise in enterprise-wide Operating Model (re)Design, Digital Transformations (>€1B investment portfolio), Restructurings, Disentanglements, Mergers & Acquisitions and forging innovative Leadership & Culture breakthrough interventions. Lean Master, Black-Belt Six Sigma, Change Management and Organizational Design expert, with Business Leadership and General Management studies completed at IMD Business School (Switzerland).
